name: BLOB Ross
description:
BLOB Ross

Made for the Mini Jam 62: Colors in 72 hours.

Join BLOB Ross in his  journey, while he tries to rescue all the bloblets!

We wanted to make a lot more levels than the 6 that are in this build, unfortunately we run out of time, enjoy your play through.

ISSUES

On  the credits page you can press Alt + F4  to close the game, sorry about that we forgot to add a message.

We messed up with the builds and had to reupload them since itch.io replaces the uploaded file if the filename is the same, sorry about that.

On the OSX build there are some issues that are only present when played on fullscreen not sure what causes it, try to play it windowed mode, apologize for the inconvenience.

CONTROLS

KEYBOARD

Movement -  WASD
Jump - Space
Spill - K
Interact - E
Switch color - Q
Restart level - P

CONTROLLER (not 100% tested):

Movement - Left stick, DPAD
Jump - A (XBOX), Cross (Dualshock)
Spill - X (XBOX), Square (Dualshock)
Interact - B (XBOX), Circle (Dualshock)
Switch color - Y (XBOX), Triangle (Dualshock)
Restart level - Start (XBOX), Options (Dualshock)

CREDITS

Alex  Kaminaris - Art
Alex Podaras - Programming
Theodore Moustakas - Sound design / Music

ATTRIBUTIONS

Sukuriburu font by Soulty Ragevin
Equipment font by Eeve Somepx
